edu.msu.cse.dkvf

Class DKVFClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.msu.cse.dkvf.DKVFBase
      • edu.msu.cse.dkvf.DKVFClient

  • public abstract class DKVFClient
extends DKVFBase
    The base class for the client side of the protocol. Any protocol needs to extends this class for the client side.
